TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Structure TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime Implements IDeserializationCallback, IEquatable(Of TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime), ISerializable
type TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime = struct interface ISerializable interface IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 提供某時區中之特定時間變更的相關資訊，例如從日光節約時間變更為標準時間，或從標準時間變更為日光節約時間。

span.span: Provides information about a specific time change, such as the change from daylight saving time to standard time or vice versa, in a particular time zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用結構表示從標準時間到日光節約時間，或從回標準時間，日光節約時間轉換發生時。You can use the structure to indicate when a transition from standard time to daylight saving time, or from daylight saving time back to standard time, occurs. 此結構支援固定日期規則和浮動日期規則。This structure supports both fixed-date rules and floating-date rules. 使用固定日期規則 （例如上午 2:00 在特定月份的特定日期發生的時間轉換Use fixed-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 11 月 3 日)。on November 3). （例如上午 2:00 特定月份特定週特定一天發生的時間轉換使用浮動日期規則Use floating-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 第一個星期日年 11 月）。on the first Sunday of November). 下表比較固定日期和浮動日期轉換中使用的內容：The following table compares the properties used in fixed-date and floating-date transitions: ||月份Month|一週Week|DayDay|時間Time| |-|-----------|----------|---------|----------| |固定日期規則Fixed-date rule||N/AN/A||| |浮動日期規則Floating-date rule||||| 固定日期和浮動日期轉換屬性會取得發生時間變更的時間。For both fixed-date and floating-date transitions, the property gets the time at which the time change occurs. 從標準轉換到日光節約時間，這是時區標準時間值。For transitions from standard to daylight saving time, this is the time zone's standard time value. 從日光節約標準時間轉換，這是時區的日光節約時間值。For transitions from daylight saving to standard time, this is the time zone's daylight saving time value. 這是值會略過其日期元件，其年、 月和日值必須一律等於 1。This is a value whose date component is ignored; its year, month, and day value must always equal 1. > [!NOTE] > 執行個體結構是不變。An instance of the structure is immutable. 一旦建立物件之後，就無法修改其值。Once an object has been created, its values cannot be modified. A可以建立物件，藉由呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)和分別建立固定或浮動日期規則的方法。A object can be created by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods to create a fixed or floating-date rule, respectively. 開始和結束物件做為參數，然後提供方法用來建立新的調整規則來包含這項轉換時間資訊。The starting and ending objects are then supplied as parameters to the method to create a new adjustment rule that includes this transition time information. 並的屬性物件傳回物件。The and properties of an object return a object.

summary.span: 定義使用固定日期規則的時間變更 (也就是在特定月份的特定日期發生的時間變更)。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立一個固定日期規則 （也就是在特定月份的特定日期發生的時間變更）。This method creates a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month). 例如，年 10 月 28，一定會發生的時間變更會遵循固定日期規則。For example, a time change that always occurs on October 28 follows a fixed-date rule. 針對標準時間轉換到日光節約時間，`timeOfDay`引數代表時區標準時間轉換的時間。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 轉換自日光節約時間到標準時間，它代表時區的日光節約時間轉換的時間。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 請注意，這是的年、 月和日期值必須全部等於 1 的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下列範例會使用固定日期規則和浮動日期規則，以建立虛數的時區的時區的轉換。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 固定日期規則定義時區的調整，以起始於上午 2:00The fixed-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 在 3 月 15 日，結束於上午 3:00on March 15 and ends at 3:00 A.M. 在 11 月 15日日到 1955 年 1900 年。on November 15 for the years 1900 to 1955. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 定義使用浮動日期規則的時間變更 (也就是在特定月份特定星期的特定日期發生的時間變更)。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立浮動日期規則 （也就是在特定月份特定週特定日期發生的時間變更）。This method creates a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month). 例如，年 10 月的最後一個星期日發生時間變更會遵循浮動日期規則。For example, a time change that occurs on the last Sunday of October follows a floating-date rule. 針對標準時間轉換到日光節約時間，`timeOfDay`引數代表時區標準時間轉換的時間。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 轉換自日光節約時間到標準時間，它代表時區的日光節約時間轉換的時間。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 請注意，這是的年、 月和日期值必須全部等於 1 的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下列範例會使用固定日期規則和浮動日期規則，以建立虛數的時區的時區的轉換。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 浮動日期規則定義時區的調整，以起始於上午 2:00The floating-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 在 3 月的最後一個星期日且結束於上午 3:00on the last Sunday of March and ends at 3:00 A.M. 在幾年來 1956年開始的 10 月的第四個星期日。on the fourth Sunday in October for the years 1956 onward. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

member this.Day : int

summary.span: 取得發生時間變更的日期。

span.span: Gets the day on which the time change occurs.
The day on which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回有效的值才屬性是`true`。The property returns a valid value only if the property is `true`. 屬性值會對應到的值`day`參數方法。The property value corresponds to the value of the `day` parameter of the method. 如果其值大於轉換的月份中的天數，轉換就會發生在當月的最後一天。If its value is greater than the number of days in the month of the transition, the transition occurs on the last day of the month. 屬性表示當月日期的固定日期規則會套用 （例如，年 4 月 15）。The property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). 相反地，屬性會指出星期幾的浮動日期規則會套用 （例如，年 11 月的第二個星期日）。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在本機電腦上找到的時區，並顯示所有固定日期轉換的轉換階段資訊。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all fixed-date transitions. 將時間資訊會包含發生時間變更的一天。The time information includes the day on which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否這兩個物件是否相等時，這個方法會執行逐屬性比較。To determine whether the two objects are equal, this method performs a property-by-property comparison. 此方法會傳回`true`只有當目前物件並`other`物件的每個有相同的值物件的六個的屬性值。The method returns `true` only if the current object and the `other` object have identical values for each of the object's six property values. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何呼叫方法。The following example illustrates calls to the method. MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsFixedDateRule { get; }
.property instance bool IsFixedDateRule
Public ReadOnly Property IsFixedDateRule As Boolean
public: property bool IsFixedDateRule { bool get(); };
member this.IsFixedDateRule : bool

summary.span: 取得值，指出時間變更發生在固定日期和時間 (例如 11 月 1 日) 或是浮動日期和時間 (例如 10 月的最後一個星期日)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the time change occurs at a fixed date and time (such as November 1) or a floating date and time (such as the last Sunday of October).

value.span: 如果時間變更規則是固定日期，則為 ；如果時間變更規則是浮動日期，則為 。

span.span: if the time change rule is fixed-date; if the time change rule is floating-date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定日期規則表示，轉換就會發生在相同的日期和時間調整規則所套用的每一年。A fixed-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on the same date and time of each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如，發生時間變更，每年 11 月 3 會遵循固定日期規則。For example, a time change that occurs every November 3 follows a fixed-date rule. 浮動日期規則表示調整規則適用於每年在特定月份特定星期的特定日期發生的轉換。A floating-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month for each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如，年 11 月的第一個星期日發生時間變更會遵循浮動日期規則。For example, a time change that occurs on the first Sunday of November follows a floating-date rule. 值屬性會決定哪些屬性物件擁有有效的值。The value of the property determines which properties of a object have valid values. 下表指出哪些屬性的值會影響屬性。The following table indicates which properties are affected by the value of the property. |TransitionTime 屬性TransitionTime property|IsFixedDateRule = trueIsFixedDateRule = true|IsFixedDateRule = falseIsFixedDateRule = false| |-----------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------------------| |`Day`|驗證Valid|未使用Unused| |`DayOfWeek`|未使用Unused|驗證Valid| |`Week`|未使用Unused|驗證Valid| |`Month`|驗證Valid|驗證Valid| |`TimeOfDay`|驗證Valid|驗證Valid| ## Examples 下列範例會列出所有本機系統可用的時區轉換時間與日光節約時間。The following example lists the transition times to and from daylight saving time for all time zones that are available on the local system. 對於固定日期規則的時區，它會顯示屬性的轉換時間資訊物件。For time zones with fixed-date rules, it displays transition time information from the properties of the object. 對於沒有固定日期規則的時區，它會使用物件，表示目前的系統行事曆，來判斷實際的開始和結束日期的轉換。For time zones without fixed-date rules, it uses a object that represents the current system calendar to determine the actual start and end dates of the transition. 此範例會顯示到主控台的結果。The example displays the results to the console. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/example1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/example1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得發生時間變更的月份。

span.span: Gets the month in which the time change occurs.
The month in which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效值屬性範圍從 1 到 12。Valid values for the property range from 1 to 12. 屬性適用於固定日期和浮動日期規則。The property is used for both fixed-date and floating-date rules. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在本機電腦上找到的時區，並顯示所有浮動日期轉換的轉換階段資訊。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 將時間資訊會包含發生時間變更的月份。The time information includes the month in which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得發生時間變更的時、分和秒。

span.span: Gets the hour, minute, and second at which the time change occurs.

value.span: 發生時間變更的當日時間。

span.span: The time of day at which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準時間轉換到日光節約時間，如值代表時區標準時間轉換的時間。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the value represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 轉換自日光節約時間到標準時間，它代表時區的日光節約時間轉換的時間。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 屬性定義的時間變更，但不是其日期的時間。The property defines only the time of a time change, but not its date. 日期由並屬性的固定規則變更，並由， ，和浮動規則變更的屬性。The date is determined by the and properties for fixed-rule changes, and by the , , and properties for floating-rule changes. 日期元件，這個值會被忽略; 的年、 月和日值永遠為 1。The date component of this value is ignored; the value of the year, month, and day is always 1. 屬性適用於固定日期和浮動日期轉換。The property is used for both fixed-date and floating-date transitions. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在本機電腦上找到的時區，並顯示這些有調整規則的時區轉換階段的資訊。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for those time zones that have adjustment rules. 將時間資訊會包含發生時間變更的時間。The time information includes the time of day at which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#6)]

member this.Week : int

summary.span: 取得發生時間變更的當月週次。

span.span: Gets the week of the month in which a time change occurs.

value.span: 發生時間變更的當月週次。

span.span: The week of the month in which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性只適用於使用浮動日期規則的時間變更。The value of the property is used only for time changes with floating-date rules. 有效的值範圍從 1 到 5。Valid values can range from 1 to 5. 屬性會定義發生時間變更的月份。The property defines the month in which the time change occurs. 屬性會決定轉換發生的一週。The property determines the week on which the transition occurs. 屬性會定義轉換發生的一週天數。The property defines the day of the week on which the transition occurs. 值屬性的判斷下, 表所示。The value of the property is determined as shown in the following table. |如果週屬性值If the Week property value is|轉換發生在The transition occurs on| |-----------------------------------|------------------------------| |11|第一個出現中的值。The first occurrence of the value in .| |22|第二次出現中的值。The second occurrence of the value in .| |33|第三次發生中的值。The third occurrence of the value in .| |44|第四個相符項目中的值。The fourth occurrence of the value in .| |55|最後一個出現中的值。The last occurrence of the value in .| 例如，如果轉換發生在三月的值的第一個星期日屬性為 1。For example, if a transition occurs on the first Sunday of March, the value of the property is 1. 如果它就會發生在三月的值的最後一個星期日屬性為 5。If it occurs on the last Sunday of March, the value of the property is 5. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉在本機電腦上找到的時區，並顯示所有浮動日期轉換的轉換階段資訊。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 將時間資訊會包含發生時間變更的當月週別。The time information includes the week of the month in which the time change occurs. 此範例也會定義`WeekOfMonth`列舉型別來顯示字串，表示的序數值屬性，而不是整數。The example also defines a `WeekOfMonth` enumeration to display a string that represents the ordinal value of the property rather than an integer. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]
